>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.kVzO7weftgwR0CQq]{Xenoambassador}

Once per day as a standard action, you can spend 1 or more Resolve Points (maximum 10 RP) to create a zone of peaceful discourse in a 10-foot radius. Any creatures in or entering this area become @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.7PPRS6krnvaTHbxh]{Fascinated} for the duration’s effect (Will negates), though they can communicate with any other creature in the area as if they shared a language. The Will save DC increases by 1 for every Resolve Point you expended to activate the ability. For each Resolve Point you expended to activate this ability, the effect lasts for 10 minutes and increases the area of effect’s radius by 20 feet. This is a mind-affecting effect.
